name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Homework Helper - Double Check AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss a homework question again with the help of AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Homework Helper for college and high school students that helps with homework and quizzes.

Need a reliable way to double-check your homework, quiz, and test answers? Double Check is the perfect solution! Designed for college and high school students, our extension ensures your answers are accurate and boosts your confidence in your academic performance.

✅ Answer Verification
Quickly double-check your homework, quiz, and test answers.

✏️ Multiple platform support
Double Check integrates with popular LMS such as Canvas, McGraw Hill and Blackboard just to name a few!

⚡️ Highlight Mode
Highlight a question and the answer choices from any website. Simply highlight the question and watch Double Check do the rest for you.

📸 Screenshot Mode
Take a screenshot of any question from any website. Simply click and drag over the question and watch Double Check do the rest for you.

🤓 Explanations
Receive in depth explanations to help you better understand the content you are learning.

🔮 Instant Feedback
Receive immediate feedback to ensure your answers are correct.

📈 Enhanced Learning
Understand your mistakes and learn from them with detailed explanations.

😀 User-Friendly Interface
Simple and intuitive design makes verification a breeze.

🤨 Got a Question?
Contact us at support@doublecheckme.com

Terms & Conditions: https://www.doublecheckme.com/tos
